context: I'm good. What kind of movies are you interested in?
I'm really hung up on animated films... like Hotel Transylvania (2012) and Hotel Transylvania 2 (2015) I'm so excited to have recently learned there's a part 3 coming 2018
Those are good. How about a partially animated film like Who Framed Roger Rabbit ? It is a hoot.
OMG! Yes, talk about classic! That reminds me of Cool World (1992)
Yes, that was an awesome movie
Right! They don't make them like that much these days. It was such an interesting concept too. I love the mix of real world versus animation I'm kinda excited for Peter Rabbit (2018) too lol
resp: You might enjoy The Fox and the Hound if you like Disney. Sad, but good.

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific genre or type of movie?
I love thrilling and adrenaline-pumping action movies with a touch of humor and suspenseful criminal elements. Do you have any recommendations in mind?
context.feelings: I'm so excited to discover new movies and get some thrilling recommendations! I can't wait to see what the recommender suggests.

context.content: Based on your preference, I recommend "Criminal (2016)". It's a thrilling action movie with a criminal element and suspenseful plot. Enjoy!
Can you tell me more about "Criminal (2016)"? I'd like to know if it has the humor and entertainment I'm looking for in addition to the thrilling action and suspenseful criminal elements.
context.feelings: I'm not sure if "Criminal (2016)" has the humor and entertainment I'm looking for. I need to ask for more details about this movie. The recommender seems knowledgeable, but I want to make sure the movie fits all my preferences. I'll ask for more information before making a decision.

context.content: "Criminal (2016)" is a gripping action film that follows a convict who receives the memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent. It features intense action sequences, suspenseful plot twists, and a touch of dark humor. The movie offers a thrilling and entertaining experience with its criminal elements and adrenaline-pumping scenes.

That sounds awesome! I'm definitely up for "Criminal (2016)". It seems to have everything I'm looking for in a movie. I can't wait to experience the thrilling action, suspenseful criminal elements, and dark humor. Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited about "Criminal (2016)"! It seems to have the thrilling action, suspenseful criminal elements, and a touch of dark humor that I love. I can't wait to watch it! The recommender did a great job understanding my preferences and recommending a movie that fits them perfectly. I'm impressed!
